1 mini set hook us g/6 4mm or size needed to meet gauge yarn needle blocking mats & pins gauge ● 27 sts x 29 row = 4 in moss st pattern unblocked dimensions ● length along longest edge 42 h ● height 23 stitch key l beg beginning cc contrast color chain chain mc main color repeat repeat rs right side single_crochet single_crochet skip skip space space ws wrong side special stitch moss st *single_crochet in next ch1-space ch1 skip next st* repeat from *to* across row or as indicated in pattern picot ch3 slip_stitch into the first chain notes ● shawlette is worked from the center of the longest edge outward to the triangle apex ● this pattern uses the moss stitch also known as linen stitch each row is a two-stitch sequence of a single_crochet in the chain-space of the previous row followed by a chain-1 ● the pattern is written for two colors indicated as mc or cc the cc consists of five mini skeins used in any desired order as one mini skein is completed it is replaced with the next ● it is recommended that the non-working yarn be carried along the edge rather than cut after each color change any rough transitions will be covered by the border ● ch1 at the start of the row does not count as a st ● the optional fastening loop helps to keep the shawlette in place around the shoulders if you would prefer a larger shawl see customization note at the end lula faye pearl shawlette t designed by michelle hillmeyer 1 instructions - main body row 1 ws mc start with magic_ring 5 single_crochet into ring ch1 turn pull yarn tail slightly to tighten ring it may help to not tighten the ring completely so the single_crochet stitches do not become bunched together and difficult to see after the first 2-3 row are completed then pull the yarn tail to completely close the ring alternative start method if you are not comfortable with making a magic_ring ch4 slip_stitch into the first chain to form a ring ch1 5 single_crochet into ring ch1 turn row 2 rs mc single_crochet in first st ch1 skip next st single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in the next st ch1 skip next st 2sc in last st change to cc ch1 turn row 3 ws cc single_crochet in first st ch1 skip next st single_crochet in ch1-space ch1 skip next st single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in ch2-space ch1 skip next st single_crochet ch1 skip next st 2sc in last st ch1 turn row 4 rs cc single_crochet in first st ch1 skip next st moss st to ch2-space
